content: Dr. Gagan Raj Gupta IIT Bhilai administration@iitbhilai.ac.in हिन्दी English A- A A+ Home Academic DepartmentsDepartment of Computer Science and EngineeringCSE Faculty Dr. Gagan Raj Gupta Dr. Gagan Raj Gupta Associate Professor, CSE Associate HoD, Mechatronics Office: Agastya Building (ED1)- Room 412 Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Bhilai EMAIL: gagan[AT]iitbhilai.ac.in Research Interest Activity-Based Learning: Designing activities to teach physics, mathematics, communication skills, computing, chemistry, biology to school students. (Video Channel). ML Systems: Large Language Models for Networks, Distributed Graph Neural Networks, Federated/Split Learning with low resource IoT devices (Telecom LLM). Multi-modal Learning and Medical Probes for Opthalmology, Dermatology, Dentistry Automated Root Cause Analysis using Time Series and/or Videos: For manufacturing Industries, Using EdgeML, Automated Surveillance, Operating Large Scale Software Systems Low Complexity Algorithms with Performance Guarantees I run the S3 research lab. You can find more details of our projects on lab page. We are looking for highly motivated PhD students to work in areas of Multi-modal learning, ML Systems, Automation/Cobotics, Medical Imaging and Devices . If you are interested, please email me and apply to IIT Bhilai PhD. program. Project staff and 6-month internships are also open. No short-term internships are currently available. I am a founding director of NetrAI, with a mission to bring quality health care to every neighborhood by developing novel medical diagnostic devices. We also conduct workshops to train volunteers to become effective teachers.
